quotes.quote: Ordinary morality is only for ordinary people.
Accept the ego of extraordinary people as they have achieved something but don't accept the ego of ordinary people.
An ordinary man gets arrogant with beauty, conceited with knowledge and ruthless with power.
Ordinary people seem not to realize that those who really apply themselves in the right way to philosophy are directly and of their own accord preparing themselves for dying and death.
I only wish that ordinary people had an unlimited capacity for doing harm; then they might have an unlimited power for doing good.
It's amazing what ordinary people can do if they set out without preconceived notions.
To say a person with a symptom is behaving in a way that is not of the ordinary implies that there is an ordinary way to behave.
There are no ordinary people. You have never talked to a mere mortal.
Ordinary People Attain Extraordinary Success - You Can Too!
Ordinary [people] avoid troubles. Extraordinary [people] turn them into advantage.
People don't follow ordinary people; they are spreading to strangers.
True Leaders take an Ordinary Person and turn them into an Extraordinary Performer.
I want ordinary people to enjoy a decent standard of living, with ever increasing security, comfort and joy.
It's okay to be average, as long as you surround yourself with extraordinary people that you become the average of.
Ordinary imperfect people, always choose similarly imperfect people as friends.
Perhaps people like us cannot love. Ordinary people can - that is their secret.
Even very ordinary people, upon closer examination, can often look extraordinary.
I could not write about 'ordinary people' because I am not in the least interested in them.
Successful people are defined as ordinary people who never gave up on their dreams and passion is the secret of that persistence!
I think that ordinary people who are placed in extraordinary circumstances find themselves pushed beyond their limits, and learn new truths about themselves.
The real untold history of our species is that of ordinary people doing ordinary things.
Ordinary people pursue money, simple people pursue power, average people pursue fame, but extraordinary people pursue ideas.
The ordinary think inside of the box, the extraordinary think outside of the box, but genius thinks inside, outside, below and above the box.
If you aim at the summits, you are an ordinary person; if you aim beyond the summits you are an extraordinary person!
Let those who are looking for some extraordinary people must know that all the extraordinariness is hidden in the ordinary people!
The beauty of ordinary lives of ordinary people in the ordinary streets is always extraordinary!
If ordinary people complain that I speak too much of myself, I complain that they do not even think of themselves.
The impression that you are a demigod worried me. I wanted to be like an ordinary human being with virtues and vices.
God designed it this way; He intended that His great power, wisdom, and love should become visible in very ordinary and otherwise inconsequential people.
